Colossians__03.1: Therefore, if you be risen with Christ, seek the things that are above; where Christ is sitting at the right hand of God:
Colossians__03.2: Mind the things that are above, not the things that are upon the earth.
Colossians__03.3: For you are dead; and your life is hid with Christ in God.
Colossians__03.4: When Christ shall appear, who is your life, then you also shall appear with him in glory.
Colossians__03.5: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, lust, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is the service of idols.
Colossians__03.6: For which things the wrath of God cometh upon the children of unbelief,
Colossians__03.7: In which you also walked some time, when you lived in them.
Colossians__03.8: But now put you also all away: anger, indignation, malice, blasphemy, filthy speech out of your mouth.
Colossians__03.9: Lie not one to another: stripping yourselves of the old man with his deeds,
Colossians__03.10: And putting on the new, him who is renewed unto knowledge, according to the image of him that created him.
Colossians__03.11: Where there is neither Gentile nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian nor Scythian, bond nor free. But Christ is all, and in all.
Colossians__03.12: Put ye on therefore, as the elect of God, holy, and beloved, the bowels of mercy, benignity, humility, modesty, patience:
Colossians__03.13: Bearing with one another, and forgiving one another, if any have a complaint against another: even as the Lord hath forgiven you, so do you also.
Colossians__03.14: But above all these things have charity, which is the bond of perfection:
Colossians__03.15: And let the peace of Christ rejoice in your hearts, wherein also you are called in one body: and be ye thankful.
Colossians__03.16: Let the word of Christ dwell in you abundantly, in all wisdom: teaching and admonishing one another in psalms, hymns, and spiritual canticles, singing in grace in your hearts to God.
Colossians__03.17: All whatsoever you do in word or in work, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.
Colossians__03.18: Wives, be subject to your husbands, as it behoveth in the Lord.
Colossians__03.19: Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter towards them.
Colossians__03.20: Children, obey your parents in all things: for this is well pleasing to the Lord.
Colossians__03.21: Fathers, provoke not your children to indignation, lest they be discouraged.
Colossians__03.22: Servants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh, not serving to the eye, as pleasing men, but in simplicity of heart, fearing God.
Colossians__03.23: Whatsoever you do, do it from the heart, as to the Lord, and not to men:
Colossians__03.24: Knowing that you shall receive of the Lord the reward of inheritance. Serve ye the Lord Christ.
Colossians__03.25: For he that doth wrong, shall receive for that which he hath done wrongfully: and there is no respect of persons with God.
